recipes.name: Souvlaki skewers
steps: Marinate halloumi, courgette, pepper, onion etc in oil, half lemon jouce, oregano, sumac, garlic and allspice
Thread onto skewers and grill for 7 minutes on each side
Serve with humous, tzatziki, flat bread and salad

recipes.name: Pasta norma
recipes.description: A tomato pasta with aubergine and ricotta salata
steps: Cut an aubergine into 2cm cubes. Salt and leave in colander for 30 mins then roast for 20 mins
Fry garlic and mix with tin of plum tomatoes and some basil
Cook for 20 to 30 minutes to thicken
Add aubergine to suace
Mix with paste and grate 25g per person ricotta salata or feta over the top with basil

recipes.name: Asparagus risotto
recipes.description: Does what it says on the tin this one
steps: Fry a couple of shallots in butter
Add 200g chopped asparagus
Add 200g of risotto rice
Keep adding vegetable stock until risotto is cooked
Add parmesan

recipes.name: Chorizo and prawn linguine
recipes.description: Chorizo and prawns, plus some lime and vinegar make this full on but amazing tasting
steps: Fry garlic, then chorizo, then prawns (get the chilli and coriander ones)
Mix in tomatoes and red wine vinegar
Add lime juice
Serve with spaghetti (or linguine)

recipes.name: Pad Thai
recipes.description: Classic Thai dish of rice noodles with prawns, eggs and tamarind
steps: Fry garlic and spring onions. Add rice noodles
Mix in combo of tamarind paste, fish sauce, sugar and chilli
Add prawns
When cooked add two eggs on the side of pan, beat till scrambled then mix in
Add beansprouts and roasted peanuts. Heat through
